    • applyBuild

      public void applyBuild​(java.awt.Point point, int workerID, boolean forceBuildDome)
      build the block or dome in the required point, then print the board for all the player
      Parameters:
      point - in which the worker will build
      workerID - is the worker which will build the block or dome
      forceBuildDome - true if Atlas power is activated, allow the player to build a dome at any level
